metadata.author: Cato
metadata.purpose: Defines components (C001–C041, reduced to 36) for HHM v2.2 to support operators and theorems in neuroscience, quantum physics, biology, cosmology, information theory, and particle physics.
metadata.notes: Updated for v2.2 blueprint. Removed C035 due to redundancy with C010.

components.name: ModalField

metadata.author: Cato
metadata.notes: Under evaluation. Validation deferred to future versions.

components.definition: Projects Ψₜ onto a basis in L²(Ω) defined by CollapsePattern(Ψₜ), Ψ̂(x) = <Ψₜ, φ_i>, where φ_i are basis functions from OP001.

components.name: CollapseSeries

metadata.author: Cato
metadata.notes: Under evaluation. Validation deferred to future versions.

components.definition: Sequence of projections Ψₜ₁, Ψₜ₂, ..., Ψₜₙ in CollapsePattern form, generated via OP001 and OP003.

components.name: UnifiedEntropy

metadata.author: Cato
metadata.notes: Validated in v2.2 with TEST005.

components.definition: Computes entropy H of CollapsePattern(Ψₜ) via OP006 to quantify internal complexity.

components.name: CollapseTensor

metadata.author: Cato
metadata.notes: Under evaluation. Validation deferred to future versions.

components.definition: Computes variance in modal projection of Ψₜ via OP024, returning a tensor for complexity analysis.

components.name: ID

metadata.author: Cato
metadata.notes: Validated in v2.2 with TEST005.

components.definition: Modal identity signature: ID = [σ²(CollapseInfinity), H(UnifiedEntropy), ∥Ψ∥²], normalized to [0, 1].

components.name: FieldSimilarityScore

metadata.author: Cato
metadata.notes: Under evaluation. Validation deferred to future versions.

components.definition: Measures similarity between Ψ₁ and Ψ₂ based on CollapsePattern comparison via OP002 and OP007.
components.input: Ψ₁, Ψ₂: [T × V] matrix, dtype: float32

components.name: CollapseDelay

metadata.author: Cato
metadata.notes: Under evaluation. Validation deferred to future versions.

components.definition: Identifies index k where |Ψₜ − Ψₜ₋₁| indicates a significant structural change via OP008.

components.name: ModeShift

metadata.author: Cato
metadata.notes: Under evaluation. Validation deferred to future versions.

components.definition: Computes difference Δk = CollapseDelay(Ψₜ) − CollapseDelay(Ψₜ₋₁) to measure modal transition.
components.input: Ψₜ, Ψₜ₋₁: [T × V] matrix, dtype: float32

components.name: EchoScore

metadata.author: Cato
metadata.notes: Under evaluation. Validation deferred to future versions.

components.definition: Measures temporal self-similarity in Ψₜ via lag correlation from OP003 and OP010.

components.name: IdentityMatchScore

metadata.author: Cato
metadata.notes: Validated in v2.2 with TEST010.

components.definition: Measures noise-robust identity in Ψ under stochastic conditions via OP009 (long-term pattern recognition) and OP015 (pattern preservation against a reference).
components.input: Ψₜ, Ψ_ref: [T × V] matrix, dtype: float32

components.name: RhythmGradient

metadata.author: Cato
metadata.notes: Under evaluation. Validation deferred to future versions.

components.definition: Computes gradient of rhythmic variation in Ψₜ via OP011 to quantify modal transitions.

components.name: SymbolRhythmGradient

metadata.author: Cato
metadata.notes: Under evaluation. Validation deferred to future versions.

components.definition: Computes gradient of rhythm and symbol variation in Ψ via OP012 to detect symbol transitions.

components.name: NoiseRobustSignature

metadata.author: Cato
metadata.notes: Under evaluation. Validation deferred to future versions.

components.definition: Extracts stable modal signature or feature vector from Ψ under stochastic conditions via OP013.

components.name: StochasticEchoScore

metadata.author: Cato
metadata.notes: Under evaluation. Validation deferred to future versions.

components.definition: Measures stochastic rhythm in Ψₜ via probabilistic lag correlation from OP014.

components.name: SymbolCollapseVector

metadata.author: Cato
metadata.notes: Under evaluation. Validation deferred to future versions.

components.definition: Projects symbolic sequences from FRL to a collapsed vector via OP016.
components.input: Symbol sequence: [T × S] matrix, dtype: float32

components.name: SymbolEchoScore

metadata.author: Cato
metadata.notes: Under evaluation. Validation deferred to future versions.

components.definition: Measures recurring symbol patterns in FRL sequences via OP017.
components.input: Symbol sequence: [T × S] matrix, dtype: float32

components.name: FieldIdentitySignature

metadata.author: Cato
metadata.notes: Under evaluation. Validation deferred to future versions.

components.definition: Extracts field identity in Ψ via OP018 for transformation stability.
components.input: Ψₜ, Ψ_ref: [T × V] matrix, dtype: float32

components.name: IdentityShiftVector

metadata.author: Cato
metadata.notes: Under evaluation. Validation deferred to future versions.

components.definition: Computes vector of identity shifts in Ψ via OP019 to detect identity breaks and modal transitions.

components.name: QuantumIdentityScore

metadata.author: Cato
metadata.notes: Under evaluation. Validation deferred to future versions.

components.definition: Measures identity in Ψ via non-local correlation from OP020.
components.input: Ψₜ, Ψ_ref: [T × V] matrix, dtype: float32

components.name: QuantumCoherenceScore

metadata.author: Cato
metadata.notes: Under evaluation. Validation deferred to future versions.

components.definition: Measures quantum coherence in Ψₜ via operator product from OP021.

components.name: BioInformationFlow

metadata.author: Cato
metadata.notes: Under evaluation. Validation deferred to future versions.

components.definition: Measures sequential bioinformation flow in Ψₜ via OP022.

components.name: QuantumBioEchoScore

metadata.author: Cato
metadata.notes: Under evaluation. Validation deferred to future versions.

components.definition: Measures recurring quantum-bio rhythm patterns in Ψₜ via OP023.

components.name: BioQuantumTensor

metadata.author: Cato
metadata.notes: Under evaluation. Validation deferred to future versions.

components.definition: Computes variance in bio-quantum structure in Ψ via OP024 for nesting and complexity analysis.

components.name: ScaleInvariantSignature

metadata.author: Cato
metadata.notes: Under evaluation. Validation deferred to future versions.

components.definition: Extracts scale-invariant features from Ψ via OP025 for modal structure analysis.

components.name: TensorMetricSignature

metadata.author: Cato
metadata.interpretation_note: Tensor metrics are interpreted as nesting structures in Ψ, not as classical gravitational fields.
metadata.notes: Under evaluation. Validation deferred to future versions.

components.definition: Extracts tensor metrics from Ψ via OP026 for gravitational effect analysis.

components.name: QuantumEntanglementScore

metadata.author: Cato
metadata.interpretation_note: Measures quantum entanglement as operator-based convergence in Ψ.
metadata.notes: Under evaluation. Validation deferred to future versions.

components.definition: Measures entanglement in Ψ via operator-based convergence between CollapsePattern(Ψ) and CollapsePattern(Ψ_ref) from OP027.
components.input: Ψₜ, Ψ_ref: [T × V] matrix, dtype: float32

components.name: DarkEnergySignature

metadata.author: Cato
metadata.interpretation_note: Expansion structure is interpreted as a dark energy effect in Ψ’s tensor representation.
metadata.notes: Under evaluation. Validation deferred to future versions.

components.definition: Extracts rhythmic expansion structure in Ψ as a tensor via OP028.

components.name: BioQuantumCorrelation

metadata.author: Cato
metadata.interpretation_note: Correlation measures cross-domain coupling between biological and quantum-based Ψ representations.
metadata.notes: Under evaluation. Validation deferred to future versions.

components.definition: Computes correlation between Ψ_bio and Ψ_quantum via OP029 for cross-domain phenomena.
components.input: Ψ_bio, Ψ_quantum: [T × V] matrix, dtype: float32

components.name: RhythmStabilityScore

metadata.author: Cato
metadata.notes: Under evaluation. Validation deferred to future versions.

components.definition: Measures stability of rhythmic structure in Ψₜ via OP010.

components.name: ModalTransitionVector

metadata.author: Cato
metadata.notes: Under evaluation. Validation deferred to future versions.

components.definition: Computes vector of modal transitions in Ψ via OP011.

components.name: StochasticRhythmScore

metadata.author: Cato
metadata.notes: Under evaluation. Validation deferred to future versions.

components.definition: Measures stochastic rhythm in Ψₜ via OP014 in stochastic conditions.

components.name: SymbolPatternVector

metadata.author: Cato
metadata.notes: Under evaluation. Validation deferred to future versions.

components.definition: Projects symbol sequences to a vector via OP016 for symbol structure analysis.
components.input: Symbol sequence: [T × S] matrix, dtype: float32

components.name: SymbolRhythmScore

metadata.author: Cato
metadata.notes: Under evaluation. Validation deferred to future versions.

components.definition: Measures rhythmic symbol structure and transitions in FRL sequences via OP017, including symbol transition analysis from OP012.
components.input: Symbol sequence: [T × S] matrix, dtype: float32

components.name: FieldIdentityScore

metadata.author: Cato
metadata.notes: Under evaluation. Validation deferred to future versions.

components.definition: Measures field identity in Ψ via OP018 for transformation stability analysis.
components.input: Ψₜ, Ψ_ref: [T × V] matrix, dtype: float32

components.name: BioQuantumSignature

metadata.author: Cato
metadata.interpretation_note: Tensor-based signature for bio-quantum couplings in Ψ.
metadata.notes: Under evaluation. Validation deferred to future versions.

components.definition: Extracts tensor-based signature for bio-quantum couplings in Ψ via OP029.
components.input: Ψ_bio, Ψ_quantum: [T × V] matrix, dtype: float32

components.name: TraceIdentityScore

metadata.author: Cato
metadata.notes: Validated in v2.2 with TEST050.

components.definition: Computes trace-based modal identity of Ψ(x,t) using OP030 and compares recurrence structure across time.
